meanings.definition: One of a pair or group of animals born at the same time to the same mother.
meanings.sent1: My puppy's littermate is a cute little dog from the same mother.
meanings.sent2: The kittens played together happily as littermates in the cozy basket.
meanings.sent3: The littermate of the duck waddled around the pond in search of snacks.
meanings.sent4: The lion cubs, littermates, roamed the savannah together, learning to hunt.
meanings.sent5: The littermate of the bear cub was always by its side, exploring the forest.

meanings.definition: A sibling born in the same litter.
meanings.sent1: The littermate squirrel quickly climbed the tree to escape the curious cat.
meanings.sent2: The puppies, littermates, wagged their tails in excitement when their owner arrived.
meanings.sent3: The littermate raccoons raided the garbage cans together, causing mischief in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The littermate kittens curled up together for a nap, purring softly in unison.
meanings.sent5: The littermate piglets squealed happily as they rolled in the mud, enjoying their playtime.
